p.s: In his speech Obama said Simple exchanges can break down walls between us.
In the following I'll mess up arguments and I will show why I got the position I have.
Of course exchanges are a good way to find new friends in other countries.
You can say thousands of benefits.
Or how Michelle Obama said It's better to travel ten thousands of kilometres than reading ten thousand of books.
What I want to say is that not only the friendships are better than also the own personality is much stronger after an exchange.
In the other hand you can say that exchanges are totoo short to getting new friend for a life.
A good example against is my own mother: When she was 16 she made a 1 month exchange to Plerain (FRFrance) and her host family is still today, 30 years later in near contact with her.
They can't see another ofdenoften but they call another and still writing letters and E-mailse-mails.
This is a perfect example for a long relationship of to friends.
